tag_list: vinyl-wall-art, vinyl-words-and-phrases, decorative-vinyl-lettering, custom-vinyl-quotes-and-designs, stick-family-car-window-decals, scrapbooking-stickers-and-rub-ons, vinyl-photo-walls, home-decor
overview:
Hi, I am Peggy, owner of Unique Surroundings business, the premier destination for vinyl wall art & decorative vinyl lettering for your home or office. My business located at 4907 Dunbar Valley Road, Fisherville, KY 40023.

For more information about my business, call at 502-410-1167 or email at info@uniquesurroundings.net.
